properties.SQL select query:
SELECT 
  s_suppkey,
  s_name,
  s_address,
  s_nationkey,
  s_phone,
  s_acctbal
FROM supplier

properties.SQL:
SELECT 
	s_suppkey,
    s_name,
    s_address,
    s_phone,
    s_acctbal,
	n_name
FROM original 
LEFT OUTER JOIN enrichment 
ON s_nationkey = n_nationkey

properties.SQL select query:
SELECT
	c_custkey,
	c_name,
	c_address,
	c_nationkey,
	c_phone,
	c_acctbal,
	c_mktsegment
FROM customer

properties.SQL:
SELECT 
	c_custkey,
	c_name,
	c_address,
	c_phone,
	c_acctbal,
	c_mktsegment,
	n_name
FROM original 
LEFT OUTER JOIN enrichment 
ON c_nationkey = n_nationkey

properties.SQL:
SELECT 
	l_orderkey,
    l_partkey,
    l_suppkey,
    l_linenumber,
    l_quantity,
    l_extendedprice,
    l_discount,
    l_tax,
    l_returnflag,
    l_linestatus,
    l_shipdate,
    l_commitdate,
    l_receiptdate,
    l_shipinstruct,
    l_shipmode,
	o_custkey,
    o_orderstatus,
    o_totalprice,
    o_orderdate,
    o_orderpriority,
    o_clerk,
    o_shippriority
FROM original
LEFT OUTER JOIN enrichment 
ON l_orderkey = o_orderkey

properties.SQL select query:
SELECT
	o_orderkey,
    o_custkey,
    o_orderstatus,
    o_totalprice,
    o_orderdate,
    o_orderpriority,
    o_clerk,
    o_shippriority
FROM orders
